verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are they that <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H6860>Ziklag,<s%> while he <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H6113>kept<s%> himself <S%H6113>close<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish:<s%> and they were among the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men, <S%H5826>helpers<s%> of the <S%H4421>war.<s%>

They were <S%H5401>armed<s%> with <S%H7198>bows,<s%> and could <S%H3231>use<s%> both the <S%H3231>right<s%> <S%H3231>hand<s%> and the <S%H8041>left<s%> in hurling <S%H68>stones<s%> and shooting <S%H2671>arrows<s%> out of a <S%H7198>bow,<s%> even of <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H251>brothers<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

The <S%H7218>chief<s%> was <S%H295>Ahiezer,<s%> then <S%H3101>Joash,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8094>Shemaah<s%> the <S%H1395>Gibeathite;<s%> and <S%H3149>Jeziel,<s%> and <S%H6404>Pelet,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5820>Azmaveth;<s%> and <S%H1294>Berachah,<s%> and <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H6069>Antothite.<s%>

And <S%H3460>Ismaiah<s%> the <S%H1393>Gibeonite,<s%> a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> man among the <S%H7970>thirty,<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H7970>thirty;<s%> and <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> and <S%H3166>Jahaziel,<s%> and <S%H3110>Johanan,<s%> and <S%H3107>Josabad<s%> the <S%H1452>Gederathite,<s%>
<S%H498>Eluzai,<s%> and <S%H3406>Jerimoth,<s%> and <S%H1183>Bealiah,<s%> and <S%H8114>Shemariah,<s%> and <S%H8203>Shephatiah<s%> the <S%H2741>Haruphite,<s%>
<S%H511>Elkanah,<s%> and <S%H3449>Jesiah,<s%> and <S%H5832>Azareel,<s%> and <S%H3134>Joezer,<s%> and <S%H3434>Jashobeam,<s%> the <S%H7145>Korhites,<s%>
And <S%H3132>Joelah,<s%> and <S%H2069>Zebadiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham<s%> of <S%H1446>Gedor.<s%>

And of the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%> there <S%H914>separated<s%> themselves to <S%H1732>David<s%> into the <S%H4679>hold<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2428>might,<s%> and men of <S%H6635>war<s%> fit for the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> that could <S%H6186>handle<s%> <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H7420>buckler,<s%> whose <S%H6440>faces<s%> were like the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of <S%H738>lions,<s%> and were as <S%H4116>swift<s%> as the <S%H6643>roes<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains;<s%>
<S%H5829>Ezer<s%> the <S%H7218>first,<s%> <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H7992>third,<s%>
<S%H4925>Mishmannah<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth,<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth,<s%>
<S%H6262>Attai<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth,<s%> <S%H447>Eliel<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh,<s%>
<S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H8066>eighth,<s%> <S%H443>Elzabad<s%> the <S%H8671>ninth,<s%>
<S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H6224>tenth,<s%> <S%H4344>Machbanai<s%> the <S%H6240>eleventh.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> were of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> <S%H7218>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>host:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H6996>least<s%> was over an <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> and the <S%H1419>greatest<s%> over a <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> <S%H1992><s%> are they that <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> when it had <S%H4390>overflowed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1428>banks;<s%> and they <S%H7760>put<s%> to <S%H1272>flight<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> them of the <S%H6010>valleys,<s%> both toward the <S%H4217>east,<s%> and toward the <S%H4628>west.<s%>
And there <S%H935>came<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to the <S%H4679>hold<s%> to <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H6440>meet<s%> them, and <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H518>If<s%> you be <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7965>peaceably<s%> to me to <S%H5826>help<s%> me, my <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall be <S%H3162>knit<s%> to you: but <S%H518>if<s%> you be come to <S%H7411>betray<s%> me to my <S%H6862>enemies,<s%> seeing there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2555>wrong<s%> in my <S%H3709>hands,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> thereon, and <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> it.

Then the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3847>came<s%> on <S%H6022>Amasai,<s%> who was <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7991>captains,<s%> and he said, Your are we, <S%H1732>David,<s%> and on your side, you <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse:<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> be to you, and <S%H7965>peace<s%> be to your <S%H5826>helpers;<s%> for your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5826>helps<s%> you. Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6901>received<s%> them, and <S%H5414>made<s%> them <S%H7218>captains<s%> of the <S%H1416>band.<s%>

And there <S%H5307>fell<s%> some of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> when he <S%H935>came<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H4421>battle:<s%> but they <S%H5826>helped<s%> them not: for the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> on <S%H6098>advisement<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> him away, <S%H559>saying,<s%> He will <S%H5307>fall<s%> to his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to the jeopardy of our <S%H7218>heads.<s%>

As he <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H6860>Ziklag,<s%> there <S%H5307>fell<s%> to him of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H5734>Adnah,<s%> and <S%H3107>Jozabad,<s%> and <S%H3043>Jediael,<s%> and <S%H4317>Michael,<s%> and <S%H3107>Jozabad,<s%> and <S%H453>Elihu,<s%> and <S%H6769>Zilthai,<s%> <S%H7218>captains<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> that were of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>

And they <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1416>band<s%> of the rovers: for they were <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> and were <S%H8269>captains<s%> in the <S%H6635>host.<s%>

For at that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H3117>day<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> him, <S%H5704>until<s%> it was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4264>host,<s%> like the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4557>numbers<s%> of the <S%H7218>bands<s%> that were ready <S%H2502>armed<s%> to the <S%H6635>war,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> to <S%H5437>turn<s%> the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to him, according to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H7420>spear<s%> were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> ready <S%H2502>armed<s%> to the <S%H6635>war.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H2428>valor<s%> for the <S%H6635>war,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and one <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>
And <S%H3111>Jehoiada<s%> was the <S%H5057>leader<s%> of the <S%H175>Aaronites,<s%> and with him were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred;<s%>

And <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> a <S%H5288>young<s%> man <S%H1368>mighty<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> and of his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8269>captains.<s%>

And of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> the <S%H251>kindred<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand:<s%> for till <S%H5704>now<s%> <S%H2008><s%> the <S%H4768>greatest<s%> part of them had <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>ward<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>

And of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> <S%H8034>famous<s%> throughout the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H5344>expressed<s%> by <S%H8034>name,<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> and make <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>king.<s%>

And of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> which were men that had <S%H998>understanding<s%> of the times, to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> ought to <S%H6213>do;<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of them were two <S%H3967>hundred;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H251>brothers<s%> were <S%H5921>at<s%> their <S%H6310>commandment.<s%>

Of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> such as <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>battle,<s%> <S%H6186>expert<s%> in <S%H4421>war,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> which could <S%H5737>keep<s%> <S%H5737>rank:<s%> they were not of double <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

And of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8269>captains,<s%> and with them with <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>
And of the <S%H1839>Danites<s%> <S%H6186>expert<s%> in <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>
And of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> such as <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>battle,<s%> <S%H6186>expert<s%> in <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

And on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> of the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> manner of <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> for the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> that could <S%H5737>keep<s%> <S%H4634>rank,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> to make <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7611>rest<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> to make <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>king.<s%>

And <S%H8033>there<s%> they were with <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking:<s%> for their <S%H251>brothers<s%> had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for them.

<S%H1571>Moreover<s%> they that were <S%H7126>near<s%> them, even to <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> and <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> on <S%H2543>asses,<s%> and on <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and on <S%H6505>mules,<s%> and on <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H3978>meat,<s%> <S%H7058>meal,<s%> <S%H1690>cakes<s%> of figs, and <S%H6778>bunches<s%> of <S%H6778>raisins,<s%> and <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H7230>abundantly:<s%> for there was <S%H8057>joy<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
